overview: There is an open space: a type of microclimate created by the desire to reforest thoughts; a type of greenhouse to fertilize the Creole seeds of a possible future. Under the immanence of earthly and spectral presences that are organized in images and summon a reciprocal opening of the senses, memories expand as a transitory sensation to lead to an understanding that takes place in the body. The vehicle here is alterity
title: Vendo de Olhos Fechados
